name: doorknob licking tournament 2009
description:
Here's the sequel to doorknob licking tournament 2008 that exists for some reason. In this one you can explore more than just one island and meet lots of different people and find a few more secrets. I made this one to procrastinate on an actually good project. Like the others, it's dumb and weird. Enjoy at your own discretion.

Also be warned, this game has mild language. Just tier one swears, nothing major.
